name: Opportunities in solar technologies for the commercial market
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Solar technologies are making a comeback in the commercial market.  The Government has said that it’s for the industry to make a market for solar thermal and PV installations. What does the industry need to do to make this happen?

presentations.name: Making solar commercially viable
presentations.speakers: Richard Rushin, UK Sales Manager, Trina Solar; and Board Member, Solar Trade Association (STA)
